[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: InterpolatedString {
                parts: [
                    Expression(
                        Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span(
                                        1,
                                        8,
                                    ),
                                    name: "foo",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                    ),
                    Literal(
                        " abc ",
                    ),
                    Expression(
                        PropertyFetch {
                            target: Variable(
                                SimpleVariable(
                                    SimpleVariable {
                                        span: Span(
                                            1,
                                            12,
                                        ),
                                        name: "bar",
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                            span: Span(
                                1,
                                21,
                            ),
                            property: Identifier(
                                SimpleIdentifier(
                                    SimpleIdentifier {
                                        span: Span(
                                            1,
                                            23,
                                        ),
                                        value: "a",
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                        },
                    ),
                    Literal(
                        " def ",
                    ),
                    Expression(
                        ArrayIndex {
                            array: Variable(
                                SimpleVariable(
                                    SimpleVariable {
                                        span: Span(
                                            1,
                                            24,
                                        ),
                                        name: "bar",
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                            index: Some(
                                LiteralInteger {
                                    span: Span(
                                        1,
                                        34,
                                    ),
                                    value: "0",
                                },
                            ),
                        },
                    ),
                    Literal(
                        " ghi ",
                    ),
                    Expression(
                        ArrayIndex {
                            array: Variable(
                                SimpleVariable(
                                    SimpleVariable {
                                        span: Span(
                                            1,
                                            36,
                                        ),
                                        name: "bar",
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                            index: Some(
                                LiteralString {
                                    span: Span(
                                        1,
                                        46,
                                    ),
                                    value: "baz",
                                },
                            ),
                        },
                    ),
                ],
            },
            semicolon: Span(
                1,
                51,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
